description: Build a file browser UI that displays user's Figma files and projects. Show file thumbnails, last modified dates, collaborators, and project organization. Support search/filter by name, date, and project. Implement infinite scroll pagination for users with many files.
title: Figma File Browser Interface

descriptionHistory.description: Build a file browser UI that displays user's Figma files and projects. Show file thumbnails, last modified dates, collaborators, and project organization. Support search/filter by name, date, and project. Implement infinite scroll pagination for users with many files.
